statements: SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT accident_location, accident_date FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_cause = 'Human Error'
SELECT accident_id, accident_location FROM nuclear_accidents ORDER BY accident_id ASC
SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_location LIKE '%Japan%'
SELECT accident_cause, lessons_learned FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_cause LIKE '%Leak%' ORDER BY accident_date
SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_id = 1;
SELECT accident_location, accident_date FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_cause LIKE '%human error%';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT accident_cause, lessons_learned FROM nuclear_accidents ORDER BY accident_id DESC;
SELECT accident_id, accident_location FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_location LIKE '%Chernobyl%' ORDER BY accident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE location='Chernobyl';
SELECT accident_date, cause FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE fatalities > 100;
SELECT location, fatalities FROM nuclear_accidents ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT cause FROM nuclear_accidents;
SELECT accident_id, location, fatalities FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_date >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT location, accident_date FROM nuclear_accidents;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_accidents FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE fatalities > 10;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE location LIKE 'U%';
SELECT cause, COUNT(*) AS total_occurrences FROM nuclear_accidents GROUP BY cause;
SELECT a.*, p.lesson_learned, p.recommendation FROM nuclear_accidents a JOIN prevention_lessons p ON a.accident_id = p.accident_id;
SELECT * FROM NuclearAccidents;
SELECT id, name, date, location FROM NuclearAccidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM NuclearAccidents WHERE date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AccidentCauses JOIN NuclearAccidents ON AccidentCauses.accident_id = NuclearAccidents.id;

SELECT name, cause, lesson FROM NuclearAccidents JOIN AccidentCauses ON NuclearAccidents.id = AccidentCauses.accident_id JOIN LessonsLearned ON AccidentCauses.accident_id = LessonsLearned.accident_id;
SELECT * FROM NuclearAccidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, name, date, location FROM NuclearAccidents WHERE location LIKE '%Japan%';
SELECT na.name, ac.cause, ll.lesson FROM NuclearAccidents na INNER JOIN AccidentCauses ac ON na.id = ac.accident_id INNER JOIN LessonsLearned ll ON na.id = ll.accident_id;
SELECT id, name, description FROM NuclearAccidents WHERE date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT name, location, count(accident_id) AS total_lessons FROM NuclearAccidents LEFT JOIN LessonsLearned ON id = accident_id GROUP BY name, location ORDER BY total_lessons DESC;
SELECT * FROM accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT accident_id, accident_description FROM accidents WHERE accident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM causes WHERE cause_description LIKE '%fire%';
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT accidents.accident_id, accidents.accident_date, locations.location_name FROM accidents JOIN locations ON accidents.accident_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM accidents WHERE accident_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT accident_description FROM accidents WHERE accident_id IN (SELECT accident_id FROM causes WHERE cause_description LIKE '%fire%');
SELECT accident_description, accident_date FROM accidents INNER JOIN causes ON accidents.accident_id = causes.accident_id WHERE cause_description LIKE '%nuclear%';
SELECT * FROM accidents WHERE accident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations ORDER BY country, location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents
SELECT accident_id, accident_date, location FROM nuclear_accidents
SELECT cause, lesson_learned FROM nuclear_accidents
SELECT * FROM accident_causes
SELECT cause_description FROM accident_causes
SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE accident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT location, cause FROM nuclear_accidents WHERE cause LIKE '%human error%';
SELECT a.*, b.cause_description FROM nuclear_accidents a JOIN accident_causes b ON a.accident_id = b.accident_id;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT person_name, location, cause FROM affected_persons ap JOIN nuclear_accidents na ON ap.accident_id = na.accident_id WHERE location = 'Japan';
